Package gui

Class MainScreen

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
gui.MainScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class MainScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Class implementing a MainScreen window as part of the GUI for the game
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • MainScreen

      public MainScreen​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playerNames)
      Creates a MainScreen object

      As part of the larger interface of the game, this window serves as the master window; virtually all of the other windows in the interface are called from the main screen.

      Parameters:
      playerNames - list of players in the game

  • Method Details

      Returns the x coordinate of an element of the number wheel
      Parameters:

      Sets the highlighted x coordinate of the wheel
      Parameters:
      number - the number on the wheel that is to be highlighted

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • highlightWheel

      public void highlightWheel​(int number)
      Performs the animation of the number wheel by highlighting consecutive elements at different intervals
      Parameters:
      number - the number to be first highlighted

    • setSpinEnabled

      public void setSpinEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables or disables the SPIN button
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the button is to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • setDrawEnabled

      public void setDrawEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables or disables the GO button
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the button is to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • setLoanEnabled

      public void setLoanEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables or disables the BUY and PAY LOANS buttons
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the buttons are to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • setDisplayBtnsEnabled

      public void setDisplayBtnsEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables or disables the RULES and CARDS buttons
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the buttons are to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • addToLog

      public void addToLog​(java.lang.String text)
      Adds a given string to the game log
      Parameters:
      text - string to be added to the game log

    • updatePlayerDetails

      public void updatePlayerDetails​(java.lang.String text, int index)
      Updates the player details displayed on the screen
      Parameters:
      text - string to overwrite the current player details
      index - index of the player whose details are to be updated

    • disableAllButtons

      public void disableAllButtons()
      Disables all the game buttons on the main screen

      During gameplay, this is used when the main screen is open but must not yet be interacted with (i.e., when the players are choosing their paths at the start space).

    • enableAllButtonsExceptGo

      public void enableAllButtonsExceptGo()
      Enables all the game buttons on the main screen except the GO button

      During gameplay, this is used at the start of a player's turn; as they have not yet spun the wheel, they should not be able to execute the functions of the spaces.

    • enableAllButtons

      public void enableAllButtons()
      Enables all the game buttons on the main screen

    • setPayEnabled

      public void setPayEnabled​(int numLoans)
      Enables the PAY LOAN button on the main screen

      During gameplay, PAY LOAN should only be enabled if the current player has loans from the bank.

      Parameters:
      numLoans - number of loans of the active player

    • setBorrowEnabled

      public void setBorrowEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables the BORROW button on the main screen

      During gameplay, BORROW should only be enabled at the start of the player's turn (i.e., before they press SPIN or GO).

      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the button is to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • setPayEnabled

      public void setPayEnabled​(boolean isEnabled)
      Enables the PAY LOAN button on the main screen
      Parameters:
      isEnabled - true if the button is to be enabled; false, otherwise

    • setActionListener

      public void setActionListener​(java.awt.event.ActionListener listener)
      Sets action listeners for the window

      One action listener is added for each of the buttons in the window.

      Parameters:
      listener - action listener for the window buttons

    • setWindowListener

      public void setWindowListener​(java.awt.event.WindowListener listener)
      Sets window listeners for the window

      One window listener is added for the window.

      Parameters:
      listener - window listener for the window

    • movePeg

      public void movePeg​(java.lang.String color, int prevIndex, int index)
      Moves the player peg of the specified player

      Player pegs are moved by setting the visibility of their pegs at the previous position as false, and setting the visibility of their pegs at the new position as true.

      Parameters:
      color - color of the peg to be moved
      prevIndex - index of the previous position of the player on the board
      index - index of the new position of the player on the board
